title: Broken By Birth
description: Itâ€™s 1992 and a baby is born in a dingy basement apartment. The child will be abandoned . . . and destined for evil. Who is baby Joshua and where does he come from? Why is The Senator involved? Can anyone stop the inevitable? This is the second book in a series of seven that re-invents the thriller - blending fact, fiction, and photos into riveting stories you'll never forget. Haunted family trees, chilling photo insights, and twisted psychopaths plunge you into a page-turner unlike anything you've ever read.
author: Jeri Fink
